name: BH Trials
description:
BH Trials is a game where you drive a backhoe loader in an unusual way. This digger has no transmission, steering is broken, and the brakes are missing. The only way to control it is through the articulated arm at one end and the loader at the opposite.The trials
Reach the exit of increasingly difficult levels using only your backhoe and your wit. Fight against the clock to unlock new levels and game modes. The trials will put you to the test. Are you in control?Play with friends
Team up with up to three friends to control a four-legged Backhoe Beast. Move like a spider, crawling and climbing the hardest obstacles yet.
